traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The retch hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing, sight, or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: Retch hounds have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Retch (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The retch hound exhales acidic bile in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
